points.title: Yadda ake samun maki?
points.inviteDesc: Maki 50 (wanda aka gayyata zai samu Maki 30)

privacy.title: Sanarwar Sirri
privacy.policyHeading: Manufar Sirri ga shafin yanar gizon kasuwanci
privacy.section1Body: Barka da zuwa [www.tanzanite.site]. Muna daraja sirrinka kuma mun kuduri aniyar kare bayananka na sirri. Wannan Manufar Sirri tana bayanin yadda muke tattarawa, amfani, bayyanawa da kare bayananka lokacin da ka ziyarci shafinmu [www.tanzanite.site] kuma ka yi amfani da sabis ɗinmu.
privacy.section2Intro: Zamu iya tattara nau’ikan bayanan sirri masu zuwa:
privacy.identityDesc: Cikakken suna, sunan mai amfani, kalmar sirri
privacy.contactDesc: Adireshin imel, lambar waya, adireshin isarwa/biya
privacy.transactionDesc: Tarihin sayayya, bayanan biyan kuɗi (ana sarrafawa ta hanyoyin biyan kuɗi na ɓangare na uku masu tsaro)
privacy.technicalDesc: Adireshin IP, nau’in burauza, bayanan na’ura, cookies da sauransu
privacy.section3Intro: Muna amfani da bayananka don waɗannan dalilai:
privacy.useProcessOrders: Don sarrafa ododi da isar da kaya
privacy.useManageAccount: Don kula da asusunka da samar da tallafin abokin ciniki
privacy.useImproveSite: Don inganta ayyukan shafin da ƙwarewar mai amfani
privacy.usePromotions: Don tura tayin talla (idan ka bayar da izini)
privacy.useLegal: Don cika wajibcin doka da ke kanki da mu
privacy.section4Title: 4. Waɗanda muke iya rabawa da bayananka
privacy.section4Intro: Zamu iya raba bayananka da ɓangarori na uku a waɗannan lokutan:
privacy.shareServiceProviders: Masu ba da sabis: hanyoyin biyan kuɗi, abokan jigilar kaya, kayan aikin nazari da sauransu
privacy.shareLegalAuthorities: Hukumomin gwamnati: idan doka ta buƙata ko don kare haƙƙinmu na doka
privacy.shareBusinessTransfers: Mu’amalolin kasuwanci: idan aka yi haɗa kamfani, siye, ko sayar da dukiya
privacy.shareNoSale: Ba ma sayar da bayananka na sirri ga wani ɓangare na uku.
privacy.section5Intro: Muna amfani da cookies da makamantansu don waɗannan dalilai:
privacy.cookiesRemember: Don tuna saitunanka da abubuwan da kake so
privacy.cookiesAnalytics: Don nazarin zirga‑zirgar shafi da yadda ake amfani da shi
privacy.cookiesPersonalize: Don daidaita abun ciki da tallace‑tallace da suka dace da kai
privacy.cookiesSettings: Kana iya daidaita saitunan cookie a cikin burauzarka.
privacy.section6Body: Muna ɗaukar matakan fasaha da na tsari masu dacewa don kare bayananka daga shiga ba tare da izini ba, gyarawa, fallasa ko lalacewa.
privacy.section7Intro: Dangane da dokokin da ke aiki a yankinka, kana iya samun haƙƙoƙi kamar haka:
privacy.rightsAccess: Haƙƙin neman ganin bayananka na sirri, gyarawa ko gogewa
privacy.rightsWithdrawConsent: Haƙƙin janye yardarka a kowane lokaci
privacy.rightsObjectProcessing: Haƙƙin ƙin yarda da wasu nau’ikan sarrafa bayanai
privacy.rightsPortability: Haƙƙin neman a ba ka bayananka a tsari da za a iya matsarwa
privacy.rightsContact: Don amfani da waɗannan haƙƙoƙi, ka tuntube mu.
privacy.section8Body: Idan kana wajen [ƙasarka], ana iya tura bayananka a cikin [ƙasarka] kuma a sarrafa su a can, inda dokokin kariyar bayanai za su iya bambanta da na yankinka.
privacy.section9Body: Wani lokaci zamu iya sabunta wannan Manufar Sirri. Duk wani canji za a wallafa shi a wannan shafi tare da sabuwar ranar fara aiki.
